synopsis.text:
That typical high school life takes an unexpected turn for Keita Amano, an avid gamer and a self-proclaimed loner. His world revolves around video games until one day, the school's idol and president of the gaming club, Karen Tendou, discovers his secret passion. In an attempt to recruit him into the club, she sets off a chain of events that introduces Keita to a side of gaming he never knew existed.

As Keita navigates through the chaotic world of competitive gaming, he finds himself in the midst of a romantic comedy filled with misunderstandings and comical battles for his sanity. With Karen's relentless pursuit and the constant bickering with fellow gamer Chiaki Hoshinomori, Keita's once uneventful life is now filled with spontaneity and mayhem.

Join Keita and his friends as they navigate through the wild world of gaming, love, and high school in this non-stop sequence of comedic scenes that promises to keep you entertained from start to finish. Will Keita survive this unexpected twist in his life, or will he succumb to the chaos that comes with being a part of the gaming club? Only one way to find out!
